text.section:
A lease, although subject to this article, is also subject to any applicable:
Certificate of title statute of this state;
Certificate of title statute of another jurisdiction (KRS 355.2A-105); or
Consumer protection statute of this state, or final consumer protection decision of a court of this state existing on the effective date of this article.

In case of conflict between this article, other than KRS 355.2A-105, subsection (3) of KRS 355.2A-304, and subsection (3) of KRS 355.2A-305, and a statute or decision referred to in subsection (1), the statute or decision controls.
Failure to comply with an applicable law has only the effect specified therein.

law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 2, effective January 1, 1993 -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 363, sec. 4, effective January 1, 1991.
